page.title: 02Housing in Southam
page.content: Southam is a market town, occupying a convenient position and is accessible to a number of other Midland towns. This contributes much to its success in attracting new residents. There are three council estates although many tenants are now buying their homes. There are numerous private estates. The latest to be completed lies to the north of the town and consists of 50 new houses. Adjacent to the playing fields of St. Mary's R.C. School, a new private development is nearing completion. There are many types of homes to choose from. There are flats by the river Stowe, delightful bungalows with views over open fields, thatched cottages and modern executive homes, all occupying prime positions in this delightful market town.
